location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.255 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jones’s earlier letter relating to the payment of compensation by the Shaikh of Aboothabee [Abu Dhabi]. Anderson writes that Jones’s proceedings in the matter are approved by Government.
